 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּט‎</span>] **verb** ==swerve, fall away== (akin to  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂטָה‎</span> q. v.; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּט‎</span> Hiph\`il is ***shake, move away***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šâ‰u***</u></abbr>, ***rebel***, [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>90</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***bring back, restore***; in [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***apostatize*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְטָא‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֶשָׂטֵי כָזָב‎</span> [[Ps.40.5|Ps 40:5]] ***those falling away to falsehood*** ([[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]]<sup>Schöpf. 40</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׂטָה‎</span>).
